definition: Bern or Berne, capital of Switzerland (Tw)
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
Burns (name)/Nicholas Burns (1956-), US diplomat, Under-secretary at US State Department from 2005

pinyin: Luo2 bo2 te4 · Bo2 en1 si1

sentences.english: Finally a word on Burnley, did last night prove they will be no pushovers this season?
sentences.chinese: 最后说说伯恩利，昨晚证明他们本赛季能够保级吗？

sentences.english: Mordo takes his power and says there's too many sorcerers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 莫度夺走了潘伯恩的法力，说世界上的魔法师太多了。

sentences.english: Burnside had thrown his army against Lee's defensive positions six times.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩赛德已经让自己的部队六次冲向李的防御阵地了。

sentences.english: I have also added a Psychology certification through Emporia State University.
sentences.chinese: 同时我还通过了伯恩利亚州立大学的心理学认证。

sentences.english: The Bernese Mountain Dog is tri-colored.
Gisborne is a city where you can indulge in gourmet dining and wine tasting.
sentences.chinese: 吉斯伯恩是一个让你纵情享受美酒佳肴的城市。

sentences.english: Sanborn has the longevity attributed their religious beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 桑伯恩曾将长寿原因归结于自己的宗教信仰。

sentences.english: He comes to the inaccurate conclusion that he must be a superspy like Jason Bourne.
sentences.chinese: 他模糊地记得自己一定是像杰森伯恩一样的超级特工。

sentences.english: Just as Mr Bowen has expected, Mr Ho says his offer is negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 不出伯恩先生所料，胡先生说他的报价可以谈判。

sentences.english: Then he sees Mr Bowen walking towards him.
sentences.chinese: 这时，他看到伯恩先生朝他走来。

sentences.english: What is your name besides Burns?
We had some good training sessions in Qatar and now we've topped it off with a win against Burnley.
sentences.chinese: 我们在卡塔尔练得不错，现在我们得战胜伯恩利。

sentences.english: Arthur F. Burns and Wesley C. Mitchell provided the classical definition.
sentences.chinese: 阿瑟楼角伯恩斯和韦斯利米切尔提供了经典的定义。

sentences.english: Burns announced negotiations on reprocessing would begin before the end of next month.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯宣布对再加工的协商将会于下个月底开始。

sentences.english: There can be no question that this was a personal attack against Murray.
sentences.chinese: 所以这不可能是伯恩斯对罗斯巴德的个人攻击。
